Articles.Content:
![Orion_logo.png](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/e/e0/Orion_logo.png)

In 2018, the Block 1 Space Launch System will make its first flight, along with the Orion MPCV. The SLS will be the largest rocket since the Saturn V and Energia, and will be the first step in humanity's path to Mars. Fortunately, you can see this happen 3 years before schedule with this replica.

**Craft Info:** 250 parts, 750 tons, 7000 m/s of dv.

**Craft Download:** (Mediafire) [_SLS_with_Orion.craft"\]Link](http://www./download/ms2cs7c7pi5h1as/%5BREPLICA)

Now for some beauty shots! (There are more this time, this baby's photogenic.)

Thanks for viewing, and leave some rep if you enjoyed! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Not bad man, not bad at all. It's a nice clean looking build. 

 The boosters are a little too wide though. That's my only complaint. Good job!

AHAHA HE DID IT!! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Nice one man!
